textBeforeTable: TV Schedule Listen Live 08/20/2011 A mother and her two daughters lost their lives in a flash flood in Pittsburgh Friday afternoon. An elderly woman also was unaccounted for after the flooding. Flash Flooding Victims Identified As Crews Locate 4th Person 08/20/2011 After conducting an intense search of the Washington Boulevard area with cadaver dogs, authorities moved their search for a missing woman who was swept away in Friday’s flash flooding to the Allegheny River. Flash Flooding Victim’s Body Found Along Allegheny River Shoreline 08/21/2011 A community gathered Sunday morning to grieve the loss of a mother and her two daughters, who died in a flash flood in Pittsburgh Friday night. Community Mourns Loss
